presets.owner-dba: The system defines the approval process, first the project Owner approves, then the DBA approves.
presets.owner: The system defines the approval process and only needs the project Owner to approve it.
presets.dba: The system defines the approval process and only needs DBA approval.
presets.admin: The system defines the approval process and only needs Administrator approval.
presets.owner-dba-admin: The system defines the approval process, first the project Owner approves, then the DBA approves, and finally the Administrator approves.

algorithm.title: Full mask
algorithm.description: All values will be masked as "******"

bb-default-partial.title: Default Partial
bb-default-partial.description: Default partial type with partial masking

algorithm.title: Range mask
algorithm.description:
Only keep the raw data in the middle, and cover the beginning and end with "**".
For example, "address" will be masked as "**dre**".
